case_title: USA v. St. Cyr et al
case_info_full_case_name: USA v. St. Cyr et al

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant pleaded guilty to Counts I and II of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 72 months on Counts 1 and II to be served concurrently; Supervised Release of 3 years on Count I and 3 years on Count II to run concurrent with any other term of supervised release; $200.00 Special Assessment due immediately; Restitution in the amount of $2,774.42 to be paid jointly and severally with: John St. Cyr in case 8:08cr351

charges.charge_description: 18:2,1153 and 113(a)(3) - ASSAULT WITH A DANGEROUS INSTRUMENT(2)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant pleaded guilty to Counts I and II of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 72 months on Counts 1 and II to be served concurrently; Supervised Release of 3 years on Count I and 3 years on Count II to run concurrent with any other term of supervised release; $200.00 Special Assessment due immediately; Restitution in the amount of $2,774.42 to be paid jointly and severally with: John St. Cyr in case 8:08cr351

The defendant pleaded guilty to Counts I and II of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 60 months on both counts; Supervised Release of 3 years on Counts I and II to run concurrent with any other term of supervised release with special conditions; $200.00 Special Assessment due immediately and Restitution in the amount of $2,774.42 to be paid jointly and severally with: Luke St. Cyr in case 8:08cr351

charges.charge_description: 18:2,1153 and 113(a)(3) - ASSAULT WITH A DANGEROUS INSTRUMENT(2)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant pleaded guilty to Counts I and II of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 60 months on both counts; Supervised Release of 3 years on Counts I and II to run concurrent with any other term of supervised release with special conditions; $200.00 Special Assessment due immediately and Restitution in the amount of $2,774.42 to be paid jointly and severally with: Luke St. Cyr in case 8:08cr351

The defendant pleaded guilty to count I of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of time served; 3 years supervised release with special conditions; $100.00 special assessment.
The defendant pleaded guilty to Count I of the Indictment and is hereby sentenced to a term of Probation for 3 years with special conditions; $100.00 Special Assessment due immediately
